TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChtmlTextWriter extends System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter

summary.span: 向 ASP.NET 服务器控件的输出流写入一系列特定于 cHTML 的字符和文本。

span.span: Writes a series of cHTML-specific characters and text to the output stream of an ASP.NET server control.

summary.span: 类提供 ASP.NET 服务器控件在将 cHTML 内容呈现给客户端时所使用的格式化功能。

span.span: The class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering cHTML content to clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Compact HTML 或 cHTML 是 HTML 2.0、HTML 3.2 和 HTML 4.0 的子集，设计用于在内存和 CPU 能力有限的设备上进行呈现，同时还可呈现小显示屏幕、有限格式设置功能以及有限数量的输入选项（如手机触摸板）。Compact HTML, or cHTML, is a subset of HTML 2.0, HTML 3.2, and HTML 4.0, and is designed to render on devices with limited memory and CPU power, along with small display screens, limited formatting capabilities, and a limited number of input options (such as a cell phone touch pad). 因此，cHTML 不支持以下功能：Therefore, cHTML does not support the following: - JPEG 图像。JPEG images. - 张.Tables. - 图像映射。Image maps. - 多字符字体和样式。Multiple character fonts and styles. - 背景颜色和图像。Background colors and images. - 文本框.Frames. - 样式表。Style sheets. 类派生自类，并且它的大部分功能由提供， 所有标记文本编写器的基类（该类是类）。 The class derives from the class and much of its functionality is provided by the and the base class for all markup text writers, which is the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个`CustomChtmlTextWriter` 从类派生的名为的类。The following code example demonstrates how to create a class named `CustomChtmlTextWriter` that is derived from the class. 它创建两个构造函数并重写方法，以`bgcolor`防止将样式特性写入对象的输出流中。It creates two constructors and overrides the method to prevent the `bgcolor` style attribute from being written to the output stream of the object. 它还将创建一个名`ChtmlCustomPageAdapter`为的类，该类`CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`定义一个方法，该方法创建并`CustomChtmlTextWriter`返回类的实例。It also creates a class named `ChtmlCustomPageAdapter` that defines one method, `CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`, which creates and returns an instance of the `CustomChtmlTextWriter` class. 然后`CustomChtmlTextWriter` ，会向具有使用 cHTML 标记的浏览器的设备呈现页面的 cHTML 内容。The `CustomChtmlTextWriter` then renders cHTML content for a page to devices with browsers that use cHTML markup. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/cs/chtmltextwriter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/vb/chtmltextwriter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类具有两个构造函数，这是直接或间接从类派生的所有类的标准。 The class has two constructors, which is standard for all classes that derive directly or indirectly from the class. 构造函数采用类的实例作为参数，调用第二个构造函数并向其传递两个参数值： The constructor, which takes an instance of the class as a parameter, calls the second constructor and passes it two parameter values: - The . - 在字段中指定的字符串值，用于定义 XHTML 文本编写器使用的制表符间距。The string value that is specified in the field, which defines the tab spacing that is used by the XHTML text writer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为`ChtmlCustomPageAdapter`的类，并定义一个方法， `CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`该方法创建并`CustomChtmlTextWriter`返回类的实例。The following code example demonstrates how to create a class named `ChtmlCustomPageAdapter` and defines one method, `CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`, which creates and returns an instance of the `CustomChtmlTextWriter` class. 然后`CustomChtmlTextWriter` ，使用使用 cHTML 标记的浏览器向设备呈现页面的 cHTML 内容。The `CustomChtmlTextWriter` then renders cHTML content for pages to devices with browsers that use cHTML markup. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/cs/chtmltextwriter.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/vb/chtmltextwriter.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数采用类的实例和字符串作为参数，在创建类的实例时调用采用相同参数的构造函数。 The constructor, which takes both an instance of the class and a string as parameters, calls the constructor that takes the same parameters when it creates an instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名`CustomChtmlTextWriter`为的自定义类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom class named `CustomChtmlTextWriter` that is derived from the class. 它创建两个构造函数，可用于创建自定义类的实例，其模式与从类直接或间接派生的所有类的模式相同。It creates two constructors that you can use to create an instance of the custom class with the same pattern as all classes that derive, directly or indirectly, from the class. summary.span: 可以在从 类派生的类中重写 方法，以筛选出不希望在支持 cHTML 的设备上呈现的特性。

span.span: You can override the method in classes that derive from the class to filter out attributes that you do not want to render on devices that support cHTML.

returns.span: 如果将特性及其值写入 输入流，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to write the attribute and its value to the output stream; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 该方法阻止全局禁止显示在属性中列出的属性和元素特定的、禁止写入到输出流中的属性中列出的属性。By default, the method prevents globally suppressed attributes that are listed in the property and element-specific, suppressed attributes that are listed in the property from being written to the output stream. 可以在派生自类的类中重写方法的行为。You can override the behavior of the method in classes that are derived from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用重写方法的自定义类，以防止将`bgcolor`特性写入 cHTML 输出流中。The following code example demonstrates how to use a custom class that overrides the method to prevent the `bgcolor` attribute from being written to the cHTML output stream. 然后，它 从类中调用基方法提供的功能，以确保也使用其默认行为。It then calls the functionality that is provided by the base method from the class to ensure that its default behavior is used, too. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 将 元素写入 cHTML 输出流。

span.span: Writes a element to the cHTML output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法向 cHTML 流中插入换行符。Use the method to insert a line break into a stream of cHTML. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何创建 cHTML 类和自定义属性。The first code example demonstrates how to create a cHTML class and custom properties. 第二个代码示例演示如何在网页上使用自定义类。The second code example demonstrates how to use a custom class on a Web page. 若要使用自`ChtmlSimplelabelAdapter`定义适配器，请将以下代码添加到 .NET Framework 配置目录的浏览器的子目录中的相应计算机范围内的文件，或添加到 Web 下的 App_Browsers 目录中的自定义浏览器文件应用程序根目录。To use the custom `ChtmlSimplelabelAdapter` adapter, add the following code to either the appropriate machine-wide file in the subdirectory for the browser of the .NET Framework configuration directory or to a custom browser file in the App_Browsers directory under the Web application root. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何为名`ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter` `SimpleLabel`为的类创建一个名为的 cHTML 适配器类。The following code example demonstrates how to create a cHTML adapter class named `ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter` for a class named `SimpleLabel`. 它创建一个自`Control`定义属性，该`ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter`属性允许类`SimpleLabel`访问类的成员，然后重写方法。It creates a custom `Control` property that allows the `ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter` class to access the members of the `SimpleLabel` class, and then overrides the method. 在替代中，将发生以下情况：In the override, the following things occur: - 它创建一个名`w`为的对象的引用， 该对象派生自作为方法的`writer`参数传递的对象。It creates a reference to a object, named `w`, which is derived from the object that is passed as the `writer` parameter for the method. - 它将创建一个字符串，并将其设置`SimpleLabel.Text`为与值相等。It creates a string and sets it equal to the `SimpleLabel.Text` value. - 它调用方法，将标签的属性定义的样式应用到 cHTML 输出流中。It calls the method to apply the styles that are defined by the property of the label to the cHTML output stream. - 它将`Text`属性值写入流，并通过调用方法关闭样式块。It writes the `Text` property value to the stream and closes the style block by calling the method. - 它调用方法，以在呈现`br`文本和样式后将元素呈现给输出流。It calls the method to render a `br` element to the output stream after the text and styles render. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/chtmltestlabel.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/chtmltestlabel.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何在网页中`SimpleLabel`使用类。The following example demonstrates how to use the `SimpleLabel` class in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/chtmltestlabel.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/chtmltestlabel.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void WriteEncodedText (string text);

Public Overrides Sub WriteEncodedText (text As String)
public: override void WriteEncodedText(System::String ^ text);
override this.WriteEncodedText : string -> unit

param.name: text
param.span: 要进行编码并写入到输出流的文本字符串。

span.span: The text string to encode and write to the output stream.

summary.span: 对请求设备的指定文本进行编码，然后将其写入到输出流。

span.span: Encodes the specified text for the requesting device, and then writes it to the output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果传入方法的文本参数为`null`或的长度为零，则不写入任何内容。If the text parameter passed into the method is `null` or has a length of zero, then nothing is written. 如果字符串包含尖括号（\<或 >）或与号（&），并且你想要确保它们在请求设备上正确呈现，请使用方法。 Use the method when a string contains angle brackets (\< or >) or an ampersand (&) and you want to ensure that they are rendered correctly on the requesting device. 方法使用基类的方法。 The method uses the base class's method.
